text: Qinâ€“Lian (Hamlim, ) is a southern branch of Yue Chinese spoken in the coastal part of Guangxi, which is represented by four traditional cities Qinzhou, Lianzhou, Lingshan and Fangcheng () or by three modern prefecture-level cities Qinzhou, Beihai and Fangcheng (). == References == Category:Guangxi Category:Languages of China
title: Qin-Lian Yue
